ema wishwawidyalaye palanadhikariya nikuth kala niwedanayaka dakwenne pasugiya masa 31 wanada bahira kshethra adhyayana katayuththak sandaha wishwawidyalayata pamini widyarthayin pirisak athurin pas denekuta korona wairasaya aasadanaya wi athayi handuna gath bawayi.ee wanawitath wishwawidyala mattamin korona walakwime saukhya margopadesha nisi paridi kriyathmaka karamin thibu bawa da kalaniya wishwawidyalaye palanadhikariya nikuth kala niwedanayaka sandahan.

mese waradi hagim athi wana eewa waradi bawa dana nokara sitimen pamanak niwana nolabena bawath apa wisin aarya wu chiththayen, aashrawa rahitha chiththayen yuthuwa aarya ashtangika margayen yuktha wuwaku bawata pathwiya yuthu bawath, aarya margaya wadamin sitinneku bawata pathwiya yuthu bawath, ese pathwimen pasuwa apa thula niwana labimata angayak lesa pawathina pragnyawada, pragnynenrdayada, pragnya balayada dharmaya wicharime hakiyawada niwana pinisa wana samma dittiya bawada datha yuthuwa pawathiyi.(awi) deshanaya 04 1.

uthuru mada palath aayurweda komasaris udayasiri chandrakumara alwis mahathata asid gasu bawata sakapita athadanguwata gena adhikaranayata idiripath kala aayurweda waidyawarayaku athulu thidena thawaduratath aprel masa 05wana dina dakwa rakshitha bandhanagaragatha karana lesa anuradhapura pradhana mahesthrath athireka disa winisuru ruwandika marapana mahathmiya eeye (27) niyoga kalaya.mese rakshitha bandhanagara gatha kale aayurweda waidya sisira kumara wikramasinha 22 wana gajaba rejimenthuwa mattakkuliya hamuda kandawure sewaye niyuthuwa siti malu welendaku wana wikramasinha aarachchige koshitha yana sakakaruwanya.pereda 27 sakakaruwan handunaganime perettuwakata idiripath kala athara waidyawarayage puthraya wana loku liyanage pasindu nawodya alwis asid praharayata pamini dewana saha thewana sakakaruwan handunagath athara waidyawarayage niwase sewaye niyuthuwa siti sewikawa wana sumana wikramasinha namaththiyata sakakaruwan dedena handunaganime perettuwedi handunaganimata nohaki wiya.siddhiya sambandhayen adhikaranayata karunu dakwu anuradhapura kottasa aparadha wimarshana anshaye sthanadhipathi polis parikshaka aar.em.ayi.bi. rathnayaka mahatha adhikaranayen illa sitiye danata rakshitha bandhanagaragathawa sitina praharaya ella kala sakakaruwan dedena asid mila di gath welenda sale himikariyawa da handunaganime perettuwakata idiripath kirimata awashyaya heyin ethek sakakaruwan thidenama rakshitha bandhanagara gatha karana lesaya.siddhiye siwwana sakshikariya aprel masa 5wani da handunaganime perettuwata idiripath kirimata katayuthu karana lesath siddhiya sambandhayen thawaduratath pulul parikshana sidu karana lesath pradhana mahesthrathwariya anuradhapura kottasa aparadha wimarshana anshayata niyoga kalaya.
mebandu athi sarala sanketha walata chitha්rapataye tharagakari kalaya yedawima genena wipaka aayojana tharamata ma pulul natha.
boru obe rakiya wadath dushkara kirimata prakashaya dirgha kalayak, namuth eya jaya ganimata sama witama hondayi, samahara api wada wadi laba atha!
